In the Houkago Play Series:

title.en: Ore to Kimitachi no Dungeon Sensou

altTitles.en: Dungeon War Between You and Me

altTitles.zh-hk: 我和你們的地下城戰爭

altTitles.ja: 俺と君達のダンジョン戦争

description.en:
In the year 2045AD, Earth is invaded by four different worlds. To defend the planet, one must conquer the dungeons connected to each of these other worlds.  Each country selects Explorers to take on this task, and Gunma, an ordinary man chosen in Japan, is suddenly thrown into the front lines of the attack! 

Scared and overequipped, he activates his [Listening[ and [EnemyDetection] skills. Then, he encounters the strongest and most beautiful girl in all of mankind! While being pushed around by the girl, who is too strong for her own good but has a tofu mentality, he rushes through the dungeon at breakneck speed... 

This is an unprecedented dungeon fantasy that loosely knocks down everything!
description.ja:
西暦2045年、地球は4つの異世界から侵攻された。防衛するには、各異世界と繋がるダンジョンの攻略が必須。その責務を担う《探索者》を各国が選出し、日本で選ばれた平凡男・グンマは突如、攻略最前線に放り込まれてしまう！

ビビりまくり、過度な重装備で〈聞き耳〉や〈索敵〉スキル発動中に出会ったのは、人類最強の美少女!?強すぎてヤベェ割には豆腐メンタルな彼女に振り回されつつ、破竹の勢いでダンジョン攻略を進んでいくのだが…？

ゆるっと全てをなぎ倒す、前人未踏のダンジョンファンタジー！

title.en: With the Ability to Replicate All Skills, Overtime Hours Change from 999 to Zero

altTitles.ja-ro: Zen Skill Fukusei Nouryoku de Zangyou Jikan 999 ￫ Zero

altTitles.ja: 全スキル複製能力で残業時間999→ゼロ

description.en: The era of conducting business with just a single "business card" has come to an end. The cutting-edge technology of "business cards/status cards" with supernatural powers has maximized the owner's abilities to their limits! To achieve victory in business, fierce battles in dungeons are about to commence!

altTitles.ja: 宇宙人のかくしごと

altTitles.en: Secret of the Alien
Extraterrestrial Secrets

description.en:
The girl I fell in love with is… an alien!? I, the class president, happened to fall in love with my classmate, the eccentric Haru. I confessed my feelings, but her true identity was an alien who came to Earth to survey it.

“I still like you!”

I started going out with Haru, but now I have a further “secret” to keep…
description.ja:
好きになった子は、宇宙人？
クラス委員長の僕は、ひょんなことからクラスメイトの変人・ハルに惚れてしまう。意を決して告白した僕だったが、彼女の正体は地球に調査に来た宇宙人だった。「それでも好きだ！」とハルと付き合い始めた僕だったが、さらなる“秘密”を抱えることに――。

title.en: Shijou Saikyou no Mahou Kenshi, F Rank Boukensha ni Tensei Suru ~Kensei to Matei, 2 Tsu no Zense o motta Otoko no Eiyuutan~

altTitles.en: The Strongest Magical Swordsman Ever Reborn as an F-Rank Adventurer

altTitles.ja: 史上最強の魔法剣士、Fランク冒険者に転生する　～剣聖と魔帝、2つの前世を持った男の英雄譚～

altTitles.zh: 最强之人转生成F级冒险者

altTitles.ko: 사상 최강의 마법검사, F랭크 모험자로 전생한다~검성과 마제, 2개의 전생을 가진 남자들의 영웅담~

description.en: Yuri was the hero who saved the world, being called "Demon Emperor" in his first reincarnation and "Sword Saint" in his second reincarnation. However, before he knew it, he was considered a "monster" and was shunned by people. Yuri finally gets fed up and decides to live 100% for himself next time. He reincarnates into the future and is immediately attacked by monsters. As he defends himself, Yuri acquires the skills of his previous lives and quickly annihilates his enemies. Eventually, Yuri arrives at the adventurers guild and decides to start his life as an F-rank novice adventurer while hiding his true strength.
description.id: Aizawa Yuri telah bereinkarnasi sebanyak 2x dan ia telah lelah menjadi penguasa ini dan itu. Dengan skill miliknya memungkinkan ia mendapatkan artefak reinkarnasi, dan ia memulai kesehariannya di dunia barunya!
description.ja: 一度目の転生では《魔帝》、二度目の転生では《剣聖》と呼ばれ、世界を救った勇者ユーリ。しかし、いつしか《化物》と人々に疎まれる存在になっていた。ついに嫌気が差したユーリは、次こそ100%自分のために生きると決意。未来の世界に再び転生する。その転生直後から襲い来るモンスターたち。咄嗟に対応するうちに、ユーリは次々と前世・前前世のスキルを取得し、あっという間に敵を殲滅していく。やがてギルドにたどり着いたユーリは、《魔帝》と《剣聖》の最強の力を秘めながら、Fランクの駆け出し冒険者として生活を始めることにするのだった――。

description.en:
Lea wrote a suicide note ahead of the wedding.
Because she'll die after the first night.

It was the miserable end of a princess who devoted her entire life to her country and the royal family.
Before she gives up her life, Lea plans her final revenge on the royal family.

It is to become a new bride who has lost her innocence.

"Why did you give up your first experience like this? Don't you want to run away?
"I... want to die."

It was an impulsive remark because he was just a one-night stand.
I thought it was meant to end like that.
Until we meet again in an unexpected place.

He eroded her orderly daily life.
Despite knowing it was a dangerous relationship, she couldn't resist him.
What on earth is that man thinking?

"You don't remember?"
The man said with a fierce smile.

"I told you I'd ruin your life."
description.id: Putri Leah membuat surat bunuh diri menjelang pernikahannya. Karena dia yakin akan mati setelah malam pernikahannya; akhir yang sangat menyedihkan dari seorang putri yang mengorbankan hidupnya untuk kerajaannya. Tetapi sebelum menyerahkan hidupnya, Leah berencana untuk membuat balas dendam terakhirnya kepada keluarganya. Meskipun dia telah menjadi mayat yang dingin, dia akan membuat mereka hancur. Dia akan membuat mereka malu dengan menjadi pengantin yang tidak perawan lagi. “Kenapa kau justru membuang keperawananmu? Bukankah kau hanya ingin melarikan diri?" "Aku ... aku hanya ingin mati." Leah secara impulsif menceritakan hal tersebut kepada pria yang menghabiskan malam pertama dengannya.

title.en: Hazure Skill "Kage ga Usui" o Motsu Guild Shokuin ga, Jitsuwa Densetsu no Ansatsusha

altTitles.en: Hazure Skill: The Guild Member with a Worthless Skill Is Actually a Legendary Assassin
The Guild Official With the Out-of-the-Way Skill "Shadowy" Is, in Fact, the Legendary Assassin
The Guild Official With Weak Skill "Vanish" Is Actually Legendary Assassin

altTitles.ru: В итоге офицер гильдии оказался легендарным убийцей

altTitles.ja: 外れスキル「影が薄い」を持つギルド職員が、実は伝説の暗殺者

altTitles.zh: 拥有开挂技能「薄影」的公会职员原来是传说级别的暗杀者

description.en:
Roland is an assassin who, one day, breaks from his team and single-handedly "kills" the demon king.

After returning to the kingdom, the king graciously promises Roland whatever he wants for his heroics. Conflicted in his desires - he hasn’t thought of anything outside of killing for years - he remembers that one of his teammates told him what she plans to do after evil is defeated: Live an ordinary life.

And so Roland, with his ability to become unnoticeable and the disguised demon king/queen Laila at his side, decides to live a - say it with me - slow life.
description.pt-br: Roland é um assassino que, um dia, rompe com sua equipe e, sozinho, "mata" o rei demônio (que na verdade é uma garota porque você deveria ter descoberto o tipo de história que é agora). Depois de retornar ao reino, o rei graciosamente promete a Roland o que ele quiser para seu heroísmo. Conflito em seus desejos - ele não pensa em nada além de matar por anos - ele lembra que um de seus companheiros de equipe disse a ele o que ela planeja fazer depois que o mal for derrotado: Viver uma vida comum.

altTitles.ja: アオアシ

altTitles.th: AOASHI แข้งเด็กหัวใจนักสู้

description.de: Aoi Ashito ist ein Mittelschüler im dritten Jahr aus Ehime. Hinter seinem rohen Spiel verbirgt sich sein immenses Talent, aber Ashito erleidet wegen seiner allzu geradlinigen Persönlichkeit einen großen Rückschlag. Der Manager der Jugendmannschaft des J1-Clubs Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, erscheint vor Ashito. Fukuda sieht Ashitos grenzenloses Potenzial und lädt ihn ein, an den Probespielen seines Teams in Tokio teilzunehmen. Die Geschichte des Jungen, der den Fußball in Japan revolutionieren wird, beginnt sich schnell zu entfalten.
description.en:
Aoi Ashito is a third year middle school student from Ehime. Behind his raw game hides his immense talent 
but Ashito suffers a huge setback because of his overly straightforward personality. 
One day the youth team manager of J1 club Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, appears in front of him. 
Fukuda sees his limitless potential and invites him to take part in his team's tryouts in Tokyo. 
The story of the boy who will revolutionize football in Japan rapidly begins to unfold.  
  
---
- **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2019**
description.ru: Ашито Аой, ученик третьего класса средней школы из префектуры Эхиме, встречает тренера «Молодежной лиги J» Фукуду Тацую. Несмотря на свою грубость, Ашито обладает таким удивительным потенциалом, что тренер Фукуда приглашает его принять участие в отборочных тестах своей команды в Токио. Взгляните на историю мальчика, который совершит революцию в японском футболе.
description.tr: Aoi Ashito Ehime'de ortaokul 3. sınıfa giden bir öğrencidir. Bir gün karşısına J1 Ligi kulübü Tokyo City Esperion'un altyapı takımı menajeri Fukuda Tetsuya çıkar. Fukuda Aoi'nin sonsuz potansiyelini farkeder ve onu Tokyo'daki altyapı seçmelerine davet eder. Böylece Japon futbolunda devrim yapacak çocuğun hikayesi başlar.
description.pt-br: Ashito Aoi, um estudante do terceiro ano do ensino médio de Ehime, conhece Fukuda Tatsuya, um treinador da "J Youth League". Mesmo que ainda tenha uma personalidade forte, Ashito tem um incrível potêncial que o fez ser convidado pelo treinador Fukuda para participar da seleção de sua equipe em Tóquio. A história do garoto que vai revolucionar o futebol no Japão vai começar.

altTitles.en: Reaper Boy
Hero Ticket

altTitles.th: ตั๋วโกงชีวิต

description.en:
Lee Kyung Ho's mind was engulfed with ending his life due to bullying and the loss of his mother. He attempts to, but is saved. His determination to commit suicide somehow entices Sierra, a grim reaper who later offers him a contract. This contract blesses him with the ability to borrow the powers of the dead in their previous life in return of sacrificing years from his lifespan. For the sake of attaining what he wishes for, he eventually agrees to it.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=730656)

---
**Official Translations:** [Chinese (Traditional Characters) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/theboyofdeath/list?title_no=1771),  [Indonesian / Bahasa](https://www.webtoons.com/id/action/ticket-hero/list?title_no=2195)
description.fr:
L'esprit de Lee Kyung Ho était complètement bouleversé à l'idée de mettre fin à ses jours à cause du harcèlement et de la perte de sa mère. Il essaie, mais il est sauvé. Sa détermination à se suicider séduit Sierra, une faucheuse sinistre qui lui offre plus tard un pacte. Ce pacte lui permet d'emprunter les pouvoirs des morts dans leur vie antérieure en échange de plusieurs années sacrifiées de sa vie. Afin d'atteindre ce qu'il souhaite, il finit par l'accepter.  
  
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/theboyofdeath/list?title_no=1771)
description.ru: Ли Кён Хо был поглощен идеей суицида, из-за издевательств в школе и гибели его матери. Очередная попытка, но спасен. Его решимость покончить с собой каким-то образом соблазняет Сиеру, мрачного жнеца, который позже предлагает ему контракт. Этот контракт даёт возможность заимствовать способности и силы мертвых из их предыдущей жизни, в обмен на силу, он должен жертвовать годами, которые ему остались на этой земле. Ради достижения того, чего он желает, он всё таки соглашается на сделку.
description.es-la: Lee Kyung Ho queria terminar su vida debido al acoso y la pérdida de su madre. Intenta hacerlo, pero no lo consigue. Su determinación de suicidarse de alguna manera fracasa, una persona llega y le ofrece un contrato. Este contrato lo bendice con la capacidad de tomar prestados los poderes de los muertos en su vida anterior a cambio de sacrificar años de su vida. Para lograr lo que desea y el acepta el trato.

Helck: Völundio ~Surreal Sword Saga~

description.en:
On a desperate battlefield... I'll start running a tavern!

Cleo, a man who has been a mercenary for 10 years, meets a mysterious girl named Kohaku. In order to survive on the battlefield, where "different swords" with great power are flying around, the two of them start running a "tavern" where soldiers gather!
description.ja:
絶望の戦場で…酒場経営はじめます！

傭兵歴10年の男・クレオは
不思議な少女・コハクと出会う。
強大な力を持つ「異剣」が飛び交う
戦場を生き延びるために、
二人が始めたのは――
兵士たちが集う「酒場」の経営！？
description.es-la:
En un campo de batalla desesperado... ¡Empieza a dirigir una taberna!

Cleo, un hombre con 10 años de experiencia como mercenario
Conoce a una misteriosa chica llamada Kohaku.
Para sobrevivir en el campo de batalla donde vuelan las poderosas "otras espadas".
Lo que los dos empiezan a hacer es... Dirigir una "taberna" donde se reúnen los soldados.

altTitles.ja: ケントゥリア

description.en: Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?! Embark on a groundbreaking journey through this action-packed dark fantasy saga!!
description.ru: Пробравшись на невольничий корабль, Юлиан отправляется на континент вместе с сотней рабов, жаждущих свободы... Но что ждёт его впереди?!
description.vi: Lén đi lậu trên một con tàu, Julian ra đi tìm đến đại lục cùng với một trăm người nô lệ khác... Ai ai cũng khao khát có được tự do, thế nhưng rồi...?!

altTitles.ja: Oh・パンタクboy

title.en: Kotowarenai Kaichou wa Tomoe-kun ni Dake shite Agetai

altTitles.ja: 断れない会長は友江くんにだけしてあげたい

altTitles.en: The President Who Can’t Say No Wants to Do It Only for Tomoe-Kun

description.en: The student council president, who is big in all sorts of ways, can't refuse when asked to do something. She tries her best to do whatever it takes to help the students, so Vice President Tomoe-kun stops her from going too far. But all she wants is to be asked for a naughty request from Tomoe-kun...
description.ja: いろいろでっかい会長は頼まれると断れない。生徒のためになることなら何でも一生懸命叶えてあげようとしてしまうので、副会長の友江くんは度が過ぎないように阻止する。でも会長は友江くんからだけはえっちなお願いをされたくて…。

description.en:
The past has changed, but like a fiery comet, he still comes. 

Mugi Hwa, the one without equal, slashed through Murim's skies with his sword, toppling every lord who dared to face him – even Cheonma, Mugeuk Geom’s father. But Mugeuk didn’t accept defeat. Instead, he turned to the forbidden: a time-bending ritual that hurled him into his own past. 

Now, retracing his steps, he races against the clock until Mugi emerges once again. But this time, it's not just about power, but mending old wounds and forging new bonds to unite his people and prepare for the bloodtide to come.
description.ko:
"나를 과거로 보내주시오."

이 시대에서 그를 죽일 수 없다면, 과거로 돌아가면 되리라. 시간을 거스를 수 있는 '회귀대법(回歸大法)'으로 그토록 원하던 과거로 회귀한 한 남자. 

가족도, 친구도, 삶도, 모두 잃었던 '검무극(劍無極)'의 복수를 위한 첫걸음이 시작된다.

description.en:
In the second year of high school, Iori Kagami is a boy who doesn’t stand out. Some of the students dislike him because of their impression of his twin sister, Shiori, who is famous as the perfect idol of their whole grade.

With special permission, Iori lives in a US military base in Japan and works part-time as an interpreter. While working with Cheena, Iori’s talents are revealed and he starts to look around at the people around him.

This is a story about how Iori’s talents are revealed when he gets involved with Christina.
description.ja: クラスに超可愛いロシア人のチーナが転入してきた！たちまち人気者になるけど、日本語がわからない彼女は困って泣き出しそう。そんな時に頼れるのは、とある誤解で皆から嫌われている主人公・伊織のみ。米軍仕込みの通訳とフィジカルでチーナを救え！ついでにバカにしてきた連中にざまぁをかませ!!「小説家になろう」発！大人気学園ラブコメコミカライズ！　※「小説家になろう」は株式会社ヒナプロジェクトの登録商標です
description.ru: В класс перешла новая супер-милая ученица Тина! Она мгновенно стала популярной, но из-за того, что девушка совершенно не знала японского, она выглядела так, будто вот-вот заплачет. В первое время, главного героя Иори ненавидели все его одноклассники за то, что он был с ней знаком. Иори спасает Тину от злобных ребят, что говорят только на японском, с помощью своих лингвистических навыков! Теперь история будет разворачиваться вокруг двух главных героев, которые должны будут преодолеть языковой барьер!

La persona de al lado me mira con esos ojos

description.en: Of course, viewers are excited, but will those being watched feel the same excitement...?
description.ja: 主人公の池沢くんは、同じクラスの美少女・江口さんのことを「そういう目」で見ている。しかし実は、江口さんも「そういう目」で池沢くんのことを見ていて！？チラ見えする筋肉、汗ばむ肌、髪の香り…互いに興味津々な2人の「下心」から始まる純愛ラブコメ！好きな人のなら、臭いも汗も×××も…全部好き。

description.en:
They are friends but not just friends.
This is a 4-koma manga about high school girls who just live their daily lives.

Akane: Short bob with black hair. She lives to enjoy life.
Matsuri: Cool blonde hair, serious at heart.
Azuki: Cute and petite dark girl.
Momiji: A sensible person who always quietly watches over everyone.

description.en: Natsuki Subaru defeats the white whale and the archbishop of the "Sloth" deadly sin, and is reunited with Emilia. The two have reconciled after overcoming a painful breakup, but new turmoil awaits them...
description.es:
Decididos a liberar a Rem de un misterioso letargo, Subaru y Emilia emprenden un nuevo viaje hacia el Santuario en donde se enfrentarán a nuevos peligros que jamás imaginarían.

¡La esperada adaptación del arco 4 comienza aquí!
description.ru: После победы над белым китом и архиепископом греха лени Петельгейзе, Субару наконец воссоединяется с Эмилией. Однако они узнают шокирующие новости, что на Круш с Рем по пути в столицу снова напал культ ведьмы. Круш потеряла свою память, а все воспоминания о Рем у людей были стёрты. Вместе с жителями деревни Субару решает вернуться обратно, однако деревня оказалась пустой. Оставшиеся жители, которые под руководством Рам отправились в так называемое "Святилище", до сих пор не вернулись. Что же там произошло?..

altTitles.ja: スパイ ファミリー

description.ar: أمضى الجاسوس الخبير المسمى <الشفق> أيامه في مهام سرية ، وكل ذلك من أجل تحقيق عالم أفضل. لكن في يوم من الأيام ، حصل على أمر جديد صعب للغاية من القيادة. من أجل مهمته ، يجب عليه تكوين أسرة مؤقتة وبدء حياة جديدة؟!
description.en:
The master spy codenamed <Twilight> has spent most of his life on undercover missions, all for the dream of a better world. Yet one day he receives a particularly difficult order from command. For his mission, he must form a temporary family and start a new life?! 

A Spy/Action/Comedy manga about a one-of-a-kind family!
description.es: El hábil espía Tasogare se dedicaba diariamente a cumplir misiones especiales por un mundo mejor. Un día recibe un complicado desafío... Su deber es crear una familia falsa y comenzar una nueva vida para poder cumplir la misión, ¿¡pero...!? ¡¡Un Espía × Acción × Comedia de una familia peculiarl!!
description.id: “Twilight,” seorang mata-mata yang hebat, setiap hari menjalankan misi rahasia untuk menciptakan dunia yang lebih baik. Suatu hari, dia mendapatkan perintah baru yang sangat sulit. Demi misi itu, dia harus memiliki keluarga sementara dan memulai hidup baru sebagai seorang ayah! Mata-mata x Aksi x Komedi keluarga istimewa!
description.it: Twilight, una delle migliori spie al mondo, ha trascorso la vita ad affrontare missioni sotto copertura per rendere il mondo un posto migliore. Un giorno però riceve un compito particolarmente difficile: dovrà formare una famiglia temporanea e iniziare una nuova vita!
description.kk: Мастер тыңшының кодтық аты<Twilight> өмірін жақсырақ әлем туралы арман үшін жасырын миссияларда өткізді. Бірақ бір күні ол командадан ерекше қиын жаңа бұйрық алады. Миссиясы үшін ол уақытша отбасын құрып, жаңа өмір бастауы керек пе?! Бірегей отбасы туралы тыңшылық/экшн/комедия!
description.pl:
Wyśmienity szpieg, Zmierzch, poświęcił się wykonywaniu tajnych misji z powodu marzeń o lepszym świecie. Ale pewnego dnia otrzymuje bardzo trudne do wykonania zadanie. Aby osiągnąć cel misji, musi założyć tymczasową rodzinę i prowadzić życie najzwyczajniejszego w świecie ojca!  
Oto opowieść o jedynej w swoim rodzaju rodzinie!
description.ru:
Мастерский шпион с кодовым именем <Сумрак> проводит свои дни в закулисных миссиях, всё ради мечты о лучшем мире. Но однажды он получает особенно сложное новое указание от командования. Для этой миссии он обязательно должен завести фиктивную семью и начать новую жизнь! Шпионская экшен-комедия об единственной в своём роде семье!

---
Хитроумный шпион по прозвищу «Сумрак» изо дня в день выполнял секретные миссии, чтобы сделать мир лучше. Однажды он получил очередное трудное задание — ради миссии ему предстоит… обзавестись временной семьёй и начать новую жизнь?! Вас ждёт яркая смесь из шпионского боевика и необычной семейной комедии!
description.th: สุดยอดสปาย "สนธยา" ได้ปฏิบัติการสอดแนมทุกๆวันเพื่อโลกที่ดีกว่า แต่แล้ววันนึงเขาก็ได้รับภารกิจสุดหิน... เพื่อการนั้นเขาจึงได้สร้างครอบครัวปลอมๆและเริ่มชีวิตใหม่!? สปาย x แอคชั่น x คอเมดี้ครอบครัวสุดแนว!
description.uk:
Холоднокровний і геніальний шпигун з кодовим ім'ям «Сутінь» завжди виконував свою роботу чітко і без зайвого шуму. Свою професію він обрав, плекаючи мрії про кращий світ. Він звик до надзвичайно складних завдань, важливість яких мала найвищий рівень, виконуючи які, він наражав своє життя на небезпеку. Але цього разу… Йому була надіслана інформація про нову місію, для успішного виконання якої «Сутінь» повинен завести сім'ю та вдавати відповідального та люблячого батька на ім'я Лоід Фолджер. Так він «удочирив» дівчинку на ім'я Аня. Дівчинка відразу входить у роль «дочки» і радіє кожній миті, яку проводить з новим «батьком». Тепер є тато та донька, але, як же мама? Нею стане неповторна наймана вбивця на ім'я Юрі Бріар (позивний - "Принцеса шипів"). 
Манґа розкриє всі тонкощі та незвичайний життєвий шлях нової «сім'ї», в якій кожен легко може виконати найскладніше завдання, або усунути ціль, але чи зможуть вони виконувати ролі «мами», «тата» та «доньки»?
description.pt-br:
O brilhante espião "Twilight" se dedicava diariamente a cumprir missões secretas por um mundo melhor. Porém, um dia, ele recebeu uma nova tarefa bastante complicada... Para cumprir a sua missão, ele deve formar uma família temporária e começar uma nova vida, mas...?! Uma história de Espiões × Ação × Comédia de uma família bem peculiar!

[ 1° TEMP.(parte 1 e 2) DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 38. ]
description.zh-hk: 技藝高超的間諜<黃昏>，為了更加美好的世界,每天從事著諜報任務。有一天，司令下達了新的難題——…。為了完成任務，所臨時組建的家庭，所展開的新生活，但是！？間諜×打鬥×與眾不同的家族喜劇現在開始！！

description.en: The Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's manga is a spin-off of its anime series. Like the Yu-Gi-Oh! GX manga, the events that take place, as well as the cards used by characters differ from those in the anime. It was published monthly in the V Jump magazine in Japanese, and has been released in English via the Shonen Jump magazine starting with the January 2011 issue. It began serialization on August 21, 2009, and ended on January 21, 2015, with a bonus chapter being announced to be included in the final volume. The author of the manga is Masahiro Hikokubo and the artist of the manga is Masashi Satō. The manga is supervised by Kazuki Takahashi.
description.pt-br: Em uma versão alternativa de Yu☆Gi☆Oh 5D's, Yuusei e seu amigo, Sect, estão duelando em Satellite quando um Cavaleiro Esqueleto de uma lenda urbana aparece, forçando Yuusei a duelar com ele pela liberdade de Sect. Em Neo-Domino, Rex Godwin está planejando um torneio conhecido como o Grand Prix D1 enquanto Jack se dirige para Satellite e confronta Yuusei, que nesta versão, parece não saber...

平成敗残兵⭐︎すみれちゃん
平成敗残兵すみれちゃん

Heisei Surviving Soldier ⭐ Sumire-chan
Heisei Remnant Soldier Sumire-chan

description.en:
A formerly unsuccessful idol turned vagrant, Sumire-chan (31). A vanquished survivor of the cutthroat competition in the showbiz world, with her mind and body both beaten by the struggle, she now lives in a run-down apartment where she spends her days lazing around, for the time being.  Her cousin Yuusei, a first-year highschooler, has been keeping an eye on her and comes to her with a proposal for a moneymaking idea.

"You have a nice body, so let's release a doujin gravure photobook."
Will Sumire-chan actually be able to stage a comeback in the world of the Reiwa era!? Let's stay tuned!
description.ja: 元・売れないアイドル、現・プータローの『すみれちゃん』31歳。芸能界の熾烈な競争に敗北し、カラダもココロもボコられた彼女は、とりあえずボロアパートでゴロゴロする日々を過ごしていた。そんな彼女に目をつけた従兄弟の高校1年生『ゆうせい』が、とある儲け話を持ちかける。「カラダはいいんだから同人グラビア写真集出そうよ」。果たしてすみれちゃんは令和の世でリベンジをかませるのか！乞うご期待！

altTitles.en: What is the use of God's awkward power?
What is the use of such awkward superpowers that God has bestowed on me?

altTitles.zh: 神赐予我这种尴尬的超能力究竟有什么用？

description.en: What a strange dream… "Ding…" habitually picked up the phone to turn off the alarm clock, but the phone turned into a beautiful girl with a puff? I understand… My superpower is… I can turn the first item touched by my right hand into a beautiful girl after waking up every day!

description.en:
Magic Level 99990000 All-Attribute Great Sage
All over the world, Monsters suddenly began appearing. The only person who could save humanity from “The Calamity” was “The Great Sage”, Ichikami Atsumu.
But, despite being satisfied in his death, he was reincarnated into the body of a boy who was bullied into killing himself, Kusanagi Minato.
Atsumu, waking up in a Japan fifty years into the future, is shocked to see a peaceful world, and where magic has become far weaker compared to when he was alive.
For now, Atsumu decides to go back to Kamui Magic Academy as Minato, but learns that mages are nothing more than a relic of the past, and in their place exist a class of privileged nobles
.After blowing off his bragging, low-levelled bullies, Atsumu gains the interest of a noble magician girl, Mizuha Yuika, as well as his schoolmates and teachers.
What’s more, Atsumu finds a sign that the Calamity, which was supposed to have been subdued, will return––
“It looks like my power is still needed”
Within the soul of student lies the Great Sage?!
The strongest Great Sage will change this world drunk on peace.
With his reincarnation in the future set, the curtain opens on a new Hero’s story!

altTitles.ja: 今朝も揺られてます

altTitles.en: They are Still Being Shaken This Morning

description.en: This is your typical story of a boy who's secretly in love with a girl, they both share a 20 minute ride on the commuter train on their way to different schools, will the boy be able to approach the girl and confess his love? And also... What he doesn't know: There's 3 other passengers that secretly support the boy's secret love towards the girl! Read now the hijinks that ensue when the boy tries to approach the girl; from the creator of *[Jitsu wa Watashi wa](https://mangadex.org/title/a990c2a1-b54f-4f4f-986c-3cdab1c9f2f9/)* and *[Yumemi ga Oka Wonderland](https://mangadex.org/title/32bbfefa-8a58-462c-bc9e-e9dd3bd4c152/)*.
description.ja: 午前6時58分舞原行きの通学電車。名前も知らないあの子と僕…とその乗客!? 高校生の男女2人が醸し出す甘酸っぱい雰囲気に、乗客たちが心情駄々洩れで盛り上がる!!
description.pt-br: Esta é a típica história de um garoto que está secretamente apaixonado por uma garota. Ambos compartilham uma viagem de 20 minutos no trem do subúrbio a caminho de escolas diferentes. O garoto será capaz de se aproximar da garota e confessar seu amor? E, além disso... O que ele não sabe: há três outros passageiros que secretamente apoiam o amor secreto do garoto pela garota! Leia agora as confusões que acontecem quando o garoto tenta se aproximar da garota; do criador de *[Jitsu wa Watashi wa](https://mangadex.org/title/a990c2a1-b54f-4f4f-986c-3cdab1c9f2f9/)* e *[Yumemi ga Oka Wonderland](https://mangadex.org/title/32bbfefa-8a58-462c-bc9e-e9dd3bd4c152/)*.

description.en: At the end of Ring ni Kakero 1, Ryuuji Takane went up against Superstar Jun Kenzaki for the World Title. Now, 17 years later, Rindo Kenzaki, the son Jun Kenzaki and nephew of Ryuuji Takane, lives with Ishimatsu Katori, the "Kenka Champion" from Ryuuji and Jun's time. Rindo will meet up with a new generation of boxers to create a new Golden Japan Jr. to take on the world.

So he resolutely rejected the system, but he didn't expect that the strong system's style of painting would suddenly change into a "dog-licking system"? ! 【You are a creature from the super high-dimensional plane Earth! 】【This system can only be your slave! 】【Master, please control yourself, you may accidentally kill this system! 】

description.en: Referred to as “The Cobra” by her employees, art director Lu Meihe appears to most as a strict and callous boss but she is actually rather innocent at heart. She has a secret crush on her intern Lin Wenjing, but because of her public image, she cannot express her feelings openly and instead pours them into the sketchbook she always carries with her. One day, she accidentally leaves the sketchbook behind only for it to be discovered by Lin Wenjing. Lu Meihe soon realizes that while Lin Wenjing may seem gentle and carefree, she may actually be hiding a secret persona of her own. Today my intern bullied me again, I’m so happy I don’t know what to do!
description.zh: 被下属称呼为“眼镜蛇”的美术组长吕美合是个外表严苛内心纯情的人。她暗恋组内实习生林文静，然而碍于形象和人设，无法自然地表达自己的情谊，只能将自己的情感寄托于随身携带的素描本。 一次意外，素描本的秘密被当事人发现，吕美合才知道，看似温柔随性的林文静，似乎人后性格不文静啊…… 今天又被后辈欺负了，太幸福了，怎么办？

Miyako is stressed out at work. Seeking solace, she tries to get a cat, but is unable to do so. She returns home dejected… only to find a child with cat ears and a hoodie lying on the floor…! When she rushes to take care of him, she finds out that he is a very beautiful boy!

The cute and dangerous life together of a beautiful boy and an office worker begins!

Flora moves into a mysterious mansion and finds it inhabited by a strange creature—Creepy Cat!
Thus begins her strange and sometimes dangerous life with a feline roommate.
This Gothic comedy brings the chuckles…and the chills!

Source: Seven Seas Entertainment
description.uk: Флора тільки-но переїхала до старого будинку, але тут вже живе моторошний котик. Відтоді й почалось їхнє таємниче співіснування.

description.en:
It was suppose to be just a normal commuter train, but then they notice that all the other passengers have disappeared, and there are only four JKs left...! Although they have never met each other before, they get off the train at the next station, and start thinking about how to make their way home...?

This is the rumored supernatural train station...?
Lost and unable to return home!
The strange daily life of the four JKs begins...!
description.pt-br:
Era para ser apenas um trem de passageiros normal, mas então eles notam que todos os outros passageiros desapareceram, e só restam quatro JKs...! Embora nunca tenham se conhecido antes, eles descem do trem na próxima estação, e começam a pensar em como voltar para casa...?

Esta é a estação de trem sobrenatural comentada...?
Perdidos e incapazes de voltar para casa!
A estranha vida diária dos quatro JKs começa...!

title.en: My Childhood Friends Are Trying to Kill Me

altTitles.pt-br: Meus Amigos de Infância Estão Tentando me Matar

description.en: I not only reincarnated into someone who died in an absurd fashion, but I also took the crown prince's place and went to the secret neutral territory, where male members of the five imperial families gathered. As a result… my childhood friends know me as a boy.    “Goodbye, guys." I cried in front of my friends who I would never meet again. That was because officially, I (the prince) was going to die soon!    It was fun spending time with them, but I will never see them again. I hope everyone lives happily!    ***    After many years, my childhood friends turned heroes who defeated the wild dragon visited me.    "…Was it you? The one who killed my friend?"    “After killing the previous crown prince, the murderer is said to be living comfortably as a princess, right?”    “I will torture you, so much so you'll wish for death."     "Answer me. Why did you kill him?”    Of course, they didn't recognize me at all. No, that's not the problem… the problem is that my childhood friends are trying to kill me. Wait a second, guys!

description.en:
Ruri, a high school student, woke up one morning to find that she had suddenly grown horns on her head!

Her mother told her that she might have inherited it because her father is a dragon. Ruri's mother tells her that she might have inherited it from her father, and she is puzzled, but goes to school anyway....

Her classmates are curious about the spontaneous horn, and another dragon constitution is revealed!

With a slight change in the usual routine, the daily life of Dragon Girl Ruri begins!

description.pt-br: Ruri Aoki é uma garota normal que um dia acorda com um par de chifres em sua cabeça. De acordo com sua mãe, o pai de Ruri, que ela nunca conheceu antes, é um dragão e Ruri só é metade humana. Esta é a história da jornada de autodescobrimento e aceitação de uma garota metade humana, metade dragão.

altTitles.mn: Аля Заримдаа Орос Хэлээр Сэтгэлээ Нуудаг

altTitles.ms: Alya yang duduk di sebelah saya terkadang membisikkan kata manis dalam bahasa Rusia
اليا يڠ دودوق دسبله ساي ترکادڠ ممبيسيقکن کات مانيس دالم بهاس روسيا

altTitles.es: Alya a veces me susurra en ruso

description.en:
"И на меня тоже обрати внимание..."

Alya, the incomparably beautiful silver-haired girl in the next seat over, occasionally mumbles to herself in Russian. She says she switches to it whenever she’s badmouthing me… but I know the truth! I know for a fact that she just said "Pay attention to me, too." to me! 

Masachika Kuze has native-level skills when it comes to Russian comprehension, but Alya has no idea about that... and that’s why she keeps on hiding those sweet feelings about him in her native language!
description.it: Masachika Kuze è seduto accanto ad Alya, una ragazza di origine russa e antenati giapponesi. Lei è bella, altezzosa e una studentessa eccezionale, mentre Masachika è secchione e noto per essere un fannullone. È un bersaglio facile per i suoi commenti in russo, che lei è fin troppo felice di tradurre - tranne per il fatto che lui può capire cosa sta dicendo in realtà!
description.ja: 「И на меня тоже обрати внимание」隣の席に座る絶世の銀髪美少女、アーリャさんは時々ロシア語を話す。本人は俺を罵倒していると言うのだが…事実は違う！さっきのロシア語、彼女は「私のことかまってよ」と言っていたのだ！実は俺、久世政近のロシア語リスニングはネイティブレベルなのである。そんな事とは露知らず、今日も甘々なロシア語でデレてくるアーリャさん！全生徒憧れの的、超ハイスペックなロシアンJKとの青春ラブコメディ！
description.mn:
Аля гэх, хэнтэй ч зүйрлэшгүй үзэсгэлэн, мөнгөлөг үстэй охин, заримдаа дотроо оросоор шивнэдэг. Тэр хэлэхдээ, намайг муулах үедээ л тэгдэг гэж хэлсэн...гэхдээ би орос хэл мэднэ! Саяхан "Надад анхаарал тавиач" гэж хэлэхийг нь би сонссон!

Масачика Күзэ орос хэлийг уугуул түвшний чадамжаар ойлгодог, гэвч Аля үүнийг мэдэхгүй...тийм болохоор өөрийнхөө сэтгэлийг орос хэлээр нуудаг!
description.pl: Masachika Kuze siedzi obok Alyi, dziewczyny pochodzenia rosyjsko - japońskiego. Jest piękną, wyniosłą i wyjątkową uczennicą, podczas gdy Masachika jest kujonem znanym z bycia leniem. Jest on więc łatwym celem dla jej komentarzy, które chętnie tłumaczy na rosyjski - z wyjątkiem tego, że on może zrozumieć, co mówi naprawdę!
description.ru: Манга по одноимённой новелле! Главный герой – Кудзе Масачика, учится в частном институте Сейрей, куда частенько попадают ученики из разных стран. Вдруг в классе Кудзе появилась новенькая. Девушка с бледной, почти прозрачной кожей, которую невозможно было увидеть у настоящих японцев, и длинными голубыми глазами-щелочками, сияющими, как сапфиры. Это была Аля – Русская девушка, что переехала в Японию...
description.vi:
“И наменятоже обрати внимание”

“Hở, gì thế?”

“Có gì đâu? Tôi nói ‘Cái tên này đúng là đồ ngốc’ ý mà.”

“Cậu thôi cái trò mắng người ta bằng tiếng Nga đi!?”

Arya - cô nàng xinh đẹp tuyệt trần có mái tóc bạch kim ngồi cạnh tôi - đang nở một nụ cười đắc thắng...

Nhưng sự thật thì, câu tiếng Nga cô ấy vừa nói có nghĩa là [Hãy để ý đến tôi đi] cơ!

Tôi - Kuze Masachika - là người có khả năng nghe hiểu tiếng Nga thông thạo như người bản xứ. Nhưng không hề hay biết điều đó, cô nàng Arya hôm nay vẫn tiếp tục thể hiện những cảm xúc rất ngọt ngào bằng tiếng Nga khiến tôi không thể ngừng cười!?

Câu chuyện tình thanh xuân hài hước của tôi với cô nàng nữ sinh trung học gốc Nga hoàn hảo đã bắt đầu như thế...
description.pt-br:
Minha colega de classe que senta ao meu lado é meio-russa, chamada Alya, ela tá sempre provocando e sussurrando em russo, só que ela não sabe que entendo muito bem o idioma russo. 

Assim começa um grande comédia romântica.

altTitles.en: There Are No Red Flowers for Ten Days

altTitles.es-la: Venganza de la Flor de Ciruelo

description.en:
The scripture that brought a bloodstorm to Jianghu was the "Wisdom of the Secret Master," a legendary book that is said to hold the power to seize all the world's authority and wealth. Because of it, Woonseon lost all his loved ones overnight. 
Now, he casts aside his bright and pure past and embarks on a desperate journey for revenge. The flower will wither in ten days. Nothing in this world will be eternal, whether it's wealth, power, or love.

altTitles.en: Mysterious Mayuri-san

altTitles.ja: 不思議のまゆりさん

description.en:
Yuusuke, a 7th grader, is interested in his friend's older sister for various reasons.
The older sister, while a little strange, is a kind and caring girl.
She's mysterious but is popular with everyone.  
This is an ordinary comedy about Mayuri-san's mysterious everyday life.

altTitles.ja: SEXYルパン・3
SEXYルパンIII
SEXYルパン三世

altTitles.ja: アタゴオル物語

description.en:
Atagoul Monogatari takes place in a fantasy world where humans and cats can talk to each other. 
The story revolves around the adventures of Hideyoshi, a big young cat, and his friends.

altTitles.ja: 憂国のモリアーティ

altTitles.en: Moriarty's Patriotism

description.ar: تدور الأحداث في إنجلترا خلال العصر الفيكتوري، حيث ننتبّع البروفيسور “جيمس موريارتي” خصم المُحقق الشهير “شيرلوك هولمز “، وذلك خلال نقطة فاصلة من حياة الأول حينما تم تبنّيه هوَ وشقيقه الأصغر “وليام مورياتي” من قِبَل عائلة من النبلاء وذلك بفضل ذكاء وحنكة “جيمس”، إلاّ أنه وأخوه يقرّران التخلّص من الطبقة الحاكمة في إنجلترا وكسر كل القوانين مما يجعلهما ينزلقان إلى الحياة الإجراميّة، وكذلك يضعهما في مفترق طُرق مع “شيرلوك” خلال تحقيقاته، في هذا السلسلة سوف يُعاد رواية سلسلة كُتب شيرلوك هولمز الكلاسيكيّة من وجهة نظر “موريارتي” هذه المرة!
description.en: In the late 19th century, Great Britain rules over a quarter of the world. Nobles sit in their fancy homes in comfort and luxury, while the working class slaves away at their jobs. When young Albert James Moriarty’s upper-class family adopts two lower-class orphans, the cruelty the boys experience at his family’s hands cements Albert’s hatred of the nobility he was born into. He asks the older of the two boys—who has a genius mind and a killer instinct—to help him rid the world of evil, starting with Albert’s own family!
description.ru:
Конец позапрошлого века, Британская империя правит миром, и в основе всего лежит классовая система. И тут внезапно появляется Джеймс Мориарти - молодой человек, желающий уничтожить зло, проистекающее из классовой дискриминации, и создать идеальную страну.  


---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Kana](https://www.kana.fr/produit/moriarty)
description.pt-br: A história de Sherlock Holmes, reimaginada com Moriarty como protagonista e explorando sua motivação para se tornar o maior criminoso que a Grã-Bretanha já viu.

title.en: Lv2 kara Cheat datta Moto Yuusha Kouho no Mattari Isekai Life

altTitles.en: Chillin’ in Another World with Level 2 Super Cheat Powers

altTitles.ja: LV2からチートだった元勇者候補のまったり異世界ライフ

altTitles.pt-br: O ex-candidato a herói, que esteve em lv2, almeja ter uma vida pacífica em outro mundo

altTitles.ru: Непринужденная жизнь в другом мире экс-кандидата в герои, оказавшегося читером со 2 уровня

altTitles.zh: 勇者候补的悠闲的异世界生活

altTitles.uk: Спокійне життя колишнього висуванця в герої, котрий виявився читером із 2 рівня

altTitles.ko: LV2부터 치트였던 전직 용사후보의 유유자적 이세계 라이프

altTitles.vi: Cuộc Sống Thảnh Thơi Tại Dị Giới Gian Lận Của Cựu Ứng Viên Dũng Giả Từ Cấp Độ Hai

description.en: Banaza, who was summoned to the magic kingdom of Cryroad as a Hero candidate, was disqualified as a Hero because of his ordinary abilities. He was supposed to be returned to his original world, but due to the magical kingdom's mistake, he became unable to return to his original world. However, the moment he reached Level 2, he acquired every single possible skill and kind of magic, turning him into a super cheat with infinite skills! Despite this, he takes Fenris of the demons as his wife, and fully enjoys his newly-married life with an easygoing smile. He changes his name to Fulio and tries to lead his life quietly, but things are a bit chaotic with the likes of a pet saber, four freeloading female knights, a Majin, and even an ex-Demon Lord. However, even with all of this chaos, he still manages to enjoy his life peacefully.
description.fr: Un jour, Banaza a été invoqué dans un autre monde, le Royaume magique de Cryroad en tant que candidat Héroïque. Malheureusement, Banaza fût disqualifié des candidats Héroïque car ces statistiques étaient très basique. Alors, le Royaume décida de l'emmener loin du château car il était inutile. Mais alors qu'il se retrouva tout seul, un ennemi apparu devant lui, avec quelques difficultés, il réussit à vaincre l'ennemi, c'est alors qu'il monta de niveau, mais pas tout à fait normalement…
description.ja: 栄えある勇者候補として異世界に召喚された青年バナザは、能力値の低さから勇者失格の烙印を押され国外追放処分となる。なんとか生き延びるべくモンスターを倒すと、レベルが２に上がり彼のステータスが見慣れない「∞」の記号に変わっていた……。突然のステータス変化に戸惑いながらもマイペースに生きていくことを決意するが、魔族の娘フェンリースと運命的な出会いを果たし――!?
description.ru:
Баназа был призван в волшебное королевство Крайроуд в качестве кандидата в герои, но на нём поставили крест, так как тот имел навыки обычного гражданина. Изначально он хотел вернуться в свой мир, но из-за ошибки представителей королевства не смог этого сделать и был вынужден остаться жить в другом мире. Сменив имя на Фурио, он решил жить в своё удовольствие. И вот так, прогуливаясь по новому для себя миру, он победил слизь, получил второй уровень и, взглянув после этого на характеристики, увидел, что все они имеют значение «∞». С этого и начинается его непринуждённая жизнь в другом мире.

---

(source: readmanga)
description.uk: Баназу, звичайного торговця, викликають до іншого світу і нарікають Героєм. Проте увагою він був оточений зовсім недовго - як тільки виявилось, що його здібності не відрізняються від здібностей пересічної людини, бідолаху виставили за двері без можливості повернутись додому. Так і почалось його спокійне життя у зовсім чужому світі, але як тільки він досягнув 2 рівня...
description.vi: Banaza là một thương nhân luôn chăm chỉ làm việc mỗi ngày đã bị đột nhiên triệu hồi tới Vương Quốc Ma Pháp Klyrode xa lạ làm ứng viên dũng sĩ. Tuy nhiên, anh đã bị đánh trượt vì chỉ có cấp độ 1 giống như dân thường. Không những vậy, anh còn không thể trở về vì sai lầm của chính quyền... Banza đã rời vương đô để tới vùng biên cảnh và phải chiến đấu với slime để giữ mạng. Thế rồi, câu chuyện có bước chuyển biến lớn sau khi anh thay đổi hình dáng và tên họ. Một ma thú đã phải lòng anh đi tới hôn nhân. Thế là họ cùng nhau hướng tới một cuộc sống thảnh thơi, không phân biệt chủng tộc!
description.pt-br:
Banaza foi invocado ao reino mágico de Cryroad como candidato a herói. No entanto, por ter especificações como as de uma pessoa comum, ele foi desqualificado e não pôde voltar ao seu mundo devido a um erro das pessoas que o invocaram. Sendo apenas nível 2, Banaza obterá forças além de sua compreensão.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/kinojomiya)

altTitles.ja: 異世界モンスターブリーダー　～チートはあるけど、のんびり育成しています～

altTitles.zh-hk: 異世界魔物培育家~帶著外掛悠哉養成中

description.en: When sent to a different world, Souta was given the unpopular profession of "Monster Tamer." However, Souta also got the skill "Absolute Domination" which gives him a 100% chance to capture anything!
description.es: Cuando fue enviado a un mundo diferente, Souta recibió la impopular profesión de "Domador de monstruos". ¡Sin embargo, Souta también obtuvo la habilidad "Dominación Absoluta" que le da un 100% de posibilidades de capturar cualquier cosa!
description.ru: Когда главного героя, Соуту, отправили в другой мир, ему досталась профессия "Укротителя монстров". К тому же, ему дали способность "Абсолютное доминирование", которая даёт ему 100% возможность получить всё что угодно.

altTitles.ja: ドラマクイン

description.en: After saving Earth, aliens have taken up residence with the humans in Japan. Nomamoto, a factory worker with an abusive alien boss, one day meets Kitami, who tells her his own family was killed by aliens. The two quickly forge a friendship, but one day Kitami does the unthinkable…
description.id: Setelah menyelamatkan Bumi, para alien tinggal bersama manusia di Jepang. Nomamoto, seorang pekerja pabrik dengan bos alien yang kejam, suatu hari bertemu dengan Kitami, yang mengatakan bahwa keluarganya sendiri dibunuh oleh alien. Keduanya dengan cepat menjalin persahabatan, tetapi suatu hari Kitami melakukan hal yang tidak terpikirkan...
description.ja: <毎週月曜更新>宇宙人が地球を救ってから、人間と宇宙人が共に住むようになった日本。工場で宇宙人の上司にこき使われるノマモトは、家族を宇宙人に殺されたという北見と出会う。仲を深める2人だが、ある日北見がとんでもないことをしてしまい…
description.ru: Пришельцы спасли Землю и обосновались с людьми в Японии. Номамото, работающая на фабрике с отвратительным боссом-пришельцем, однажды встречает Китами, который рассказывает ей, что семью его убили пришельцы. Между ними быстро возникает дружба, но однажды Китами совершает немыслимое...
description.uk: Після порятунку Землі прибульцями, Японія стала спільним домом для них та людей. Номото, яка змушена терпіти знущання від свого боса-прибульця на заводі, зустрічає Кітамі, чиє серце розбите втратою сім'ї, вбитої прибульцями. Між ними виникає щира дружба, яка переходить до здійснення їх бажань... винищення всіх прибульців...
description.pt-br: Após salvar a Terra, os alienígenas passaram a viver com os humanos no Japão. Nomamoto, uma operária de fábrica com um chefe alienígena abusivo, um dia conhece Kitami, que conta que sua própria família foi morta por alienígenas. Os dois rapidamente formam uma amizade, mas um dia Kitami faz o impensável…

title.en: Isekai Shoukan Oji-san no Juumusou Life ~Sabage Suki Salaryman wa Kaisha Owari ni Isekai e Chokki suru~

altTitles.ja: 異世界召喚おじさんの銃無双ライフ 〜サバゲー好きサラリーマンは会社終わりに異世界へ直帰する〜

altTitles.ru: Призванный в потусторонний мир дядя - живёт оружейным воином

altTitles.en: The Gunner's Life of a Middle-aged Man Summoned to Another World and Armed with a Rifle: An Airsoft Addicted Salaryman Returns to the Alternative World After Work

altTitles.id: Om-Om Pegawai Kantoran Pecinta Airsoft Pergi Ke Dunia Lain

altTitles.vi: Cuộc sống "thiện xạ" của ông chú được triệu hồi sang dị giới

description.en: The middle-aged man and airsoft enthusiast Daisuke Koga is summoned to a different world on his 40th birthday. Given the ability to turn airsoft guns into real guns, Daisuke must save the other world while traveling back and forth between reality and the fantasy world. Alongside female swordsman Rena, Daisuke becomes the only gun user and dominates in the fantasy world after work!
description.id: Seorang om-om yang hobi bermain airsoft bernama koga daisuke telah terpanggil ke dunai lain pada ulang tahunnya yang ke-40. Dianugerahi sebuah kekuatan untuk mengubah senjata airsoft menjadi senjata asli, daisuke harus bisa menyelamatkan dunia tersebut selagi bolak-balik dari dunia lain ke dunia nyata. bersama dengan seorang ksatria bernama lena, daisuke menjadi satu-satunya pengguna senapan yang akan mendominasi dunia lain tersebut sepulang kerja!
description.ja: サバゲー好きのサラリーマン・古賀大介は、40歳の誕生日を迎えた日に異世界に召喚された。現実と異世界を行き来しながら、異世界を救うことになった大介に与えられたのは、「エアガンを本物の銃に変化させる能力」。異世界で出会った女性剣士・レナと共に、大介は唯一の銃使いとして会社終わりに異世界で無双する!!

title.en: Doteihen Reijou ni Hyoui Shita 800-nen Mae no Akujo wa Hissori Seishun o Tanoshinde Iru

altTitles.ja: ど底辺令嬢に憑依した800年前の悪女はひっそり青春を楽しんでいる

altTitles.ja-ro: Doteihen Reijou ni Hyoui Shita 800-nen Mae no Akujo wa Hissori Seishun wo Tanoshinde Iru

altTitles.en: The 800-Years-Old Villainess who Possessed a Low-Ranking Lady Peacefully Enjoyed her Youth

altTitles.es-la: La villana de 800 años que posee a una joven de poder bajo disfruta pacíficamente de su juventud

altTitles.id: Villainess 800 Tahun yang Merasuki Bangsawan Tingkat Rendah Menikmati Masa Mudanya

description.en:
Nora, who had been sealed for 800 years for threatening to destroy the world, was very bored. One day, she heard the voice of a girl—Cecily—wishing to die, and was awakened. By that time, she'd grown feeble, and her body had shriveled. Thus, Nora proposed to Cecily.

"If that's the case, would you lend me your body? In exchange, I promise that in a year, you'll have a friend, a lover, a warm family, and promising future prospect for your perfect restart!"

The "Incorrigible Villainess," Nora, was resurrected in the body of the "Withered Grass Lady," Cecily.
description.id:
Nora, yang telah disegel selama 800 tahun karena menjadi ancaman akan kehancuran  dunia, merasa sangat bosan. Suatu hari, dia terbangun karena mendengar suara seorang gadis—Cecily—yang ingin mati. Pada saat itu, dia sudah lemah, dan tubuhnya terlihat layu. Maka, Nora mengajukan sesuatu kepada Cecily.
"Jika itu masalahnya, maukah kamu meminjamkan tubuhmu padaku? Sebagai gantinya, aku berjanji dalam satu tahun, kamu akan memiliki teman, kekasih, keluarga yang hangat, dan prospek masa depan yang menjanjikan untuk memulai kembali dengan sempurna!"
"Penjahat yang Tidak Dapat Dikoreksi", Nora, dibangkitkan dalam tubuh "Gadis Layu", Cecily.
description.ja:
『稀代の悪女』であるノーラ＝ノーズは、その罪により800年もの間封印されている。
そんな彼女の最近の楽しみは、遠視の魔法で学校というものを視ること。
ある日いつものように学校を視ていると、「死にたい……」という助けを求める声が聞こえてきた。
「死にたいと思うなら、あなたの体を私に預けてみない？」
ノーラは声の主であった『枯草令嬢』と呼ばれるシシリーに憑依。
いじめられっ子だった彼女を取り巻く状況を改善させていく！
800年前の最強悪女、ハチャメチャ楽しい青春を過ごす！
description.es-la: Nora Noze, una poderosa maga que fue sellada debido a sus maldades, ha realizado un pacto con la joven Cecily para poseer su cuerpo y vivir su vida durante 1 año. Ahora Nora deberá afrontar la vida diaria de Cecily y de paso disfrutar las experiencias que nunca pudo en su vida pasada.

title.en: There's a Rat in Our House

altTitles.en: There Is a Mouse in My House
There's a Mouse in my House

description.en: Amidst the freezing winter, a solitary being huddled on the snow-covered pavement, bearing the burden of deep loneliness and faded scars. It had forsaken itself, fragile and vulnerable. The reason for welcoming this nameless creature into the home was straightforward. "What... does this mean?" "You helped me, and I wish to return the favor." In the complete darkness where no trace of light could penetrate, only two warm bodies occupied the space

title.en: A Mother's Love, a Daughter's Prison

altTitles.ja: 母という呪縛 娘という牢獄

altTitles.vi: Lời nguyền của mẹ - Ngục tù của con

altTitles.ja-ro: Haha to iu Jubaku Musume to iu Rougoku

description.en: The torso of a headless, limbless body is found half-buried by a riverbank. It belonged to middle-aged mother Yaeko Miyagawa, and after an investigation and trial, her daughter Hikari eventually confesses to her murder. For many years, Hikari had been subjected to physical and emotional abuse by her mother, revolving around her failure to make it into a top medical school and become a doctor. Even after nine years of futile applications and entrance exams, Yaeko refused to free her daughter from this virtual prison. What led to the fatal stabbing that ended Yaeko’s life? This series, based on a true story, will explore Hikari Miyagawa’s experiences up to her greatest tragedy—and what happened to her afterward.
description.vi:
Đây là một câu chuyện dựa trên sự việc có thật.
Một th... th... với đầu và tứ chi bị ch.t đ.ứ.t l.ì.a được phát hiện thấy bên bờ sông. Sau khi điều tra, cảnh sát đã xác minh danh tính nạn nhân là Miyagawa Yaeko, thế nhưng rúng động hơn, hung thủ gây ra vụ án dã man này không ai khác chính là Miyagawa Hikari, con gái của bị hại.
Được biết suốt thời gian qua, Miyagawa Hikari đã liên tục bị mẹ ép học hành quá mức, và đã thi trượt vào Đại học Y đến 9 lần. Thế nhưng, mẹ cô lại không hề có ý định dừng lại. Và rồi, chuyện gì đến cũng sẽ phải đến...
